item.description:
Hello All,

My name is Cheryl Yaeger (some of you may remember me from various group meetings), and I will be trying to fill Charis's big shoes as your new organizer this year. I have posted a poll that will close in one week, this way you will still have a month after the poll decision to read the book. I look forward to meeting the members that I don't already know, and to have a great year of interesting reads! Feel free to contact me if you have questions.

Thx,
Cheryl

*Just as a note: I will be continuing the current practice of asking for $1 from each member at the meetings.
item.how_to_find_us: I will put a small table sign out, but if it helps I am short with brown hair.

group.name: The Brookline Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: January Book Meetup - The Tipping Point (Malcolm Gladwell)
